Title.evidence: a randomized trial in patients with peripheral cT1aN0 NSCLC

Trial_Design.evidence: 697 patients were randomized to LR (357) or SLR (340)

Intervention.evidence: treated with either lobar (LR) or sublobar resection (SLR)

Objective.evidence: Objective: We have recently reported the primary results of CALGB 140503 (Alliance)

Method_Outcome.evidence: Five-year DFS was 64.7% after LR [95% CI; 59.6–70.1%]

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: patients were randomized to LR (357) or SLR (340) stratified by clinical tumor size, histology and smoking history

Number_Analysed.evidence: A total of 362 patients had LR, 131 had SR and 204 had WR

Result_Outcome.evidence: Five-year DFS was 64.7% after LR [95% CI; 59.6–70.1%]
